title: august 19: model minority myth in south africa
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the history of Chinese South Africans and the damage of the Model Minority Myth. After, Maia the historical day in 1967 when The Beatles’ song “All You Need Is Love” hits #1. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
